abstract: Billed as the world's only expo dedicated to urban art, Stroke.Artfair runs from Oct. 14 to 16 at Berlin's Postbahnhof.
snippet: Billed as the world's only expo dedicated to urban art, Stroke.Artfair runs from Oct. 14 to 16 at Berlin's Postbahnhof.
lead_paragraph: Billed as the world's only expo dedicated to urban art, Stroke.Artfair runs from Oct. 14 to 16 at Berlin's Postbahnhof (Strasse der Pariser Komunne 8; 49-30-698-1280; www.postbahnhof.de).

headline.main: Street Art Presented Live at Berlin Fair
